title: The Duchess of Sussex shares a new photo of baby Archie for Harry's birthday
text:
From Harper's BAZAAR

The Duchess of Sussex shared a collage of photos to celebrate her husband's 35th birthday including a previously unseen picture of baby Archie. Meghan posted the image to the couple's Sussex Royal account along with a very sweet message.

The duchess shared a grid of nine photos of her husband, from him as a baby to him on his wedding day and one picture of him with his son Archie at his Christening, where Meghan could be seen holding the baby while Harry knelt down beside them.

"Your service to the causes you care so deeply for inspires me every day," Meghan wrote in the caption. "You are the best husband and most amazing dad to our son. We love you ❤️Happiest birthday!"

The couple are currently preparing for their first royal tour as a family of three. Meghan, Harry and Archie will visit South Africa in a few weeks time, where they will take time to meet various charities and initiatives that are close to their hearts. Harry recently said that he was "so excited" to introduce his wife and son to the country.

The duchess recently returned from her maternity leave, arriving to the John Lewis store in central London to launch her capsule collection with Smart Works, a charity that helps to get women prepared for heading back into the workplace.
